text:
In press: In Wuhan, China, adults with confirmed #COVID19 who had received the bacillus Calmette–Guérin (BCG) #vaccine in childhood had less severe COVID-19 pneumonia & milder liver function deficiency in connection with a lower death rate.

Full study: https://t.co/WtLm6oE25t https://t.co/4kpAKMdv3B
